## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests passed
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added TSDoc comments to new functions/classes
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked my code with `npm run lint`
- [ ] I have run `npm run typecheck` and fixed all type errors
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented in BREAKING_CHANGES.md)
